name: My Way (lildyll)
description:
--Made in 72 Hours for the Winter Game Jam--

After an evil villain murdered your pet rock, you'd do anything to see her gone. However, when the world ends in 5 minutes, you must ensure she dies by your own hands.

Run through buildings and defeat the henchmen to gather enough walkie-talkies to find the boss who killed your pet rock. 

ESC Closes Game
WASD or Arrow Keys to Move
Left Click to Shoot
Mouse to Aim
R to Reload
Scroll to switch guns
Shift to Dash

--Credits
Programming - Me
Character Art - Elpir
Character Animations - Me
Background/Tiles - Vimlark City Tile Set
Music and Sound - Me
Playtesting - Arpir, KidConeMangler, Elpir, GhostyRazz
